author: cnbc.com
title: TOTVS - 4Q17 Earnings Results
text:
SAO PAULO, Feb. 7, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- TOTVS S.A. (B3: TOTS3), the leading developer of business solutions in Brazil, announces today its results for the fourth quarter of 2017 (4Q17) . The Company's consolidated financial statements were prepared in accordance with the accounting practices adopted in Brazil, which are in consonance with the International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS).
Net Revenue: R$2,227.3 million in 2017 (+2.0% vs. 2016) and R$554.4 million in 4Q17 (+0.8% vs. 4Q16 and -1.4% vs. 3Q17) . Recurring Revenue: R$1,466.4 million in 2017 (+8.7% vs. 2016) and R$374.1 million in 4Q17 (+8.8% vs. 4Q16 and +1.6% vs. 3Q17) . Subscription Revenue: R$307.9 million in 2017 (+34.3% vs. 2016) and R$86.4 million in 4Q17 (+34.8% vs. 4Q16 and +9.5% vs. 3Q17) . Annual Recurring Revenue from Subscription : R$368.0 million in 4Q17 (+41.5% vs. 4Q16 and +10.1% vs. 3Q17) . Adjusted EBITDA: R$303.5 million in 2017 (-15.4% vs. 2016) and R$69.1 million in 4Q17 (+13.8% vs. 4Q16 and +11.0% vs. 3Q17) . Adjusted Net Income: R$96.4 million in 2017 (-40.5% vs. 2016) and R$16.9 million in 4Q17 (-43.2% vs. 4Q16 and +21.6% vs. 3Q17) . Net Operational Cash Flow: R$329.8 million in 2017 (+26.6% vs. 2016) and R$90.6 million in 4Q17 (+33.9% vs. 4Q16 and +16.7% vs. 3Q17) . Net Debt: R$322.3 million in 2017 (-32.7% vs. 2016) , corresponding to 1.1x Adjusted EBITDA in 2017 (vs. 1.3x Adjusted EBITDA in 2016) .
For more information: http://ir.totvs.com
